title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. E, art. 2, pt. 504 - Medical Care-enrollment Of Providers
content:

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. E, art. 2, pt. 504

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§201, 206; Social Services Law, §§20, 34, 131, 363, 363-a, 364, 365-a, 365-b, 367, 367-a, 367-b, 368-a, 368-c

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
